N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 575.7 - Standards pertaining to waiver of eligibility

State Regulations
(a) Eligibility criteria may be waived for an
individual who is determined to be eligible pursuant to section
575.6
(b) of this

Part, but who does not qualify for community support services under the
permanent eligibility criteria of section
575.6
(c) of this

Part or the categorical eligibility criteria of section
575.6
(d) of this

Part. (b) Waivers authorized
pursuant to this section shall be permitted if it is determined by a nurse, psychiatrist, psychologist or social worker, as defined in section
575.4
of this Part, that exclusion
from the community support services program shall result in: (1)
admission to an inpatient psychiatric
facility; (2)
inappropriate removal
of the individual from his or her current residential setting; or
(3)
a marked decline in the individual's
mental or physical condition. (c) No more than 10 percent of the
individuals receiving community support services from a core service agency or
a provider of services which directly contracts with the Office of Mental

Health shall be otherwise ineligible individuals for whom eligibility has been
waived. Notes
